name: Primate Piracy
description:
You are found guilty for piracy by the British Crown. In retribution, your booty has been taken. This includes your jump button!

Controls:
Jump - Occurs automatically when the jump meter runs out
Movement - A and D
Full screen Toggle - F4
Exit to Menu - Esc

You have 3 hearts, if they run out the game restarts!
Bananas replenish hearts, keep an eye out!

The difficulty is quite hard, but try your best!
Try to get all the bananas and a high coin score.

Credits:
Development/Art - Gabe Bernini
Additional Sprites and Art - Devon Carranco & Ethan Thevarajah
Music/SFX/Sprites - Kyle McIllece
